comment.body:
![Screenshot from 2023-02-26 01-02-08](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/98787049/221386966-55e07058-2979-4777-bfee-3b678c9daf2f.png)

I cannot reproduce it even using a real Korean IP address.
Do you use another adblocker like AdBlock Plus or Unicorn Pro adblocker? If so, please disable or remove it.

If you use Unicorn Pro adblocker, you may remove it because it is unstable one.

If some banking security program installed on your computer, please follow [this wiki](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/wiki/AdGuard-%EB%AC%B8%EC%A0%9C-%EC%A7%84%EB%8B%A8#%EA%B8%88%EC%9C%B5-%EB%B3%B4%EC%95%88-%EC%86%8C%ED%94%84%ED%8A%B8%EC%9B%A8%EC%96%B4%EC%99%80%EC%9D%98-%EC%B6%A9%EB%8F%8C%EB%A1%9C-%EC%9D%B8%ED%95%B4-%EB%B0%9C%EC%83%9D%ED%95%98%EB%8A%94-%EA%B2%BD%EC%9A%B0).

<details><summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

진짜 대한민국 IP 주소를 사용하더라도 구현할 수 없습니다.
AdBlock Plus나 유니콘 Pro 광고 차단기 같은 다른 광고 차단기를 사용하시나요? 그렇다면, 비활성화하거나 제거해주세요.

만약 유니콘 Pro 광고 차단기를 사용하시면, 불안정하기 때문에 제거해야 할 수 있습니다.

만약 일부 금융 보안 프로그램이 설치되었다면, [이 위키](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/wiki/AdGuard-%EB%AC%B8%EC%A0%9C-%EC%A7%84%EB%8B%A8#%EA%B8%88%EC%9C%B5-%EB%B3%B4%EC%95%88-%EC%86%8C%ED%94%84%ED%8A%B8%EC%9B%A8%EC%96%B4%EC%99%80%EC%9D%98-%EC%B6%A9%EB%8F%8C%EB%A1%9C-%EC%9D%B8%ED%95%B4-%EB%B0%9C%EC%83%9D%ED%95%98%EB%8A%94-%EA%B2%BD%EC%9A%B0)를 따라주세요.

</details>

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Resolved by List-KR filter.
The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` in AdGuard tray menu.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 AdGuard 트레이 메뉴에 있는 `필터 업데이트 확인...`을 클릭하여 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.
